JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Senior Telecommunication Tender Engineer, DK - Esbjerg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you the experience Telecom tech person who has a passion for commercial work and tender process? Do you want to enhance or explore your skills within commercial scope of work? Would you like to work in an organization where you do the puzzle instead of being a part of the puzzle? Then come join us!

Your position
As our new Senior Telecommunication Tender Engineer, you will join our dedicated Global Tender team, consisting of ten welcoming colleagues located in Denmark and Singapore. Together, we gather telecommunication tenders that range from DKK 0.5 million to DKK 200 million, covering a wide spectrum of projects, from the latest network solutions to CCTV and entertainment systems.

You will have the chance to engage in cutting-edge technology and innovation, working on projects that push the boundaries of telecommunication solutions. Above all, your work will make a real change for life offshore and the global energy sector.

Your place of work will be at our Global HQ located in Esbjerg, the hub of the Danish energy industry, right on the waterfront – views do not get any better than this. The position is full-time, and you can expect to travel up to 25 days per year.

"This is your opportunity to join a team of technical multi-disciplinary experts running offshore telecommunication tender projects for large international organizations. You will be involved in projects of different sizes all over the world, based on a team environment where we succeed together,” says Søren Rønne Barslund, Senior Manager, Telecom Tender.

Your tasks & responsibilities
In your role as a Senior Telecommunication Tender Engineer, you will be responsible for producing commercial and technical proposals for telecommunication systems based on customers’ inquiries and requirements.

Your tasks will include but are not limited to:

  • Finding and documenting the right technical solutions while engaging with our technical teams, HSEQ, Procurement and other relevant departments
  • Preparing potential project risk analyses and working to increase profit margins
  • Coordinating and gathering tender packages
  • Assisting in sales and project execution assignments


Your profile & qualifications
We are looking for an outgoing and analytical professional who is passionate about tender projects and wants to leave their personal mark on it. You have a proactive and organized approach to your work and thrive in a workday with lots of variation.

To succeed in this position, we imagine that you have:

  • A relevant educational background could be eighter as trained Electrician with field experience or an education within Electrical Engineering
  • Experience working as an electrical or electronics engineer or with telecommunications is an advantage, but not a requirement
  • Experience with tenders is an advantage, however no prior tender experience is required; we offer complementary learning and development opportunities for the enthusiastic candidate.
  • Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written


Welcome to Semco Maritime
At Semco Maritime, we create change. For people. For projects. And for the global energy sector. With us, you will join a community of over 2,400 of the most dedicated thinkers and doers in the energy industry who are driving real change and making their own personal mark on the global energy landscape.

While everyone knows why the energy transition is vital, we are concerned with the journey. How to get there. By providing the answers needed to make change real. Because we believe that global energy ambitions can only be realized through hard work and clever pragmatic solutions. This is what we do. This is what we invite you to participate in.

So yes, working for us will change the energy sector – and may well change you too.

Care to join the movement?
Change. With us.

Contact & Deadline
We conduct our interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, please submit your application as soon as possible via the link on the page.
https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/senior-telecommunication-tender-engineer/o4mcmz/en

If you have any questions, you are more than welcome to contact Søren Rønne Barslund, Senior Manager, Telecom Tender, at +45 2525 6643.

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company with 2,400 employees and 40 years of dedication rooted in both the conventional energy sector and the offshore wind industry. This puts us in a unique position to bridge today's and tomorrow’s solutions, constantly seeking clever and pragmatic ways to realise global energy ambitions. We do this through comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects together with world-leading partners across the globe.
https://www.semcomaritime.com/
﻿
